hero.heading: Get In Touch
hero.description: Ready to start your transformation journey? We're here to support you every step of the way.

contactForm.heading: Send Us a Message
contactForm.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

fields.label: Message
fields.placeholder: Tell us about your goals, challenges, or any questions you have...

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quick answers to common questions about our services

items.question: How quickly will I see results?
items.answer: Most clients begin experiencing shifts within the first few weeks. Significant transformations typically occur within 3-6 months of consistent engagement.

items.question: What makes PivotSimply different?
items.answer: Our holistic approach combines evidence-based practices with spiritual alignment, addressing all dimensions of life for complete transformation.

items.question: Can I switch between membership tiers?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or change your membership at any time. We'll help you find the right tier for your current goals and situation.

items.question: Is there a community aspect?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our Conscious Creator Circle and higher tiers include access to our supportive community of like-minded individuals on similar journeys.
